ygData.messageBody:
The following eqbards poll is now closed. Here are the
final results:


POLL QUESTION: Please click on the link below to answer this
survey question. *DO NOT RESPOND BY EMAIL* Votes
are not counted by email.
Question:
Which of the following skills do you use
regularly? (ie, have hotkeyed, can't live
without, etc.)

CHOICES AND RESULTS
- Forage, 31 votes, 28.44%
- Sneak, 9 votes, 8.26%
- Safe Fall, 34 votes, 31.19%
- Hide, 9 votes, 8.26%
- Disarm Traps, 1 votes, 0.92%
- Tracking, 24 votes, 22.02%
- Pick Locks, 1 votes, 0.92%



For more information about this group, please visit
http://www.egroups.com/group/eqbards

For help with eGroups, please visit
http://www.egroups.com/help
